resources.string: The time zone is too short to add
The time zone is too short to add dubbing!
dubbing can not be added to the trailer!
Can not add dubbing to titles!
too short time to add effects!
Can not add special effects to end of trailer!
Theme title can not be added!
The area is too small to add subtitles!
Captions can not be added to the trailer!
You have not selected a picture or video!
You have not selected the picture yo!
You have not selected the video yo!
Click the button to delete the currently selected dub clip
Press and hold dubbing, release dubbing ends
Click the small icon to change the transition style!
small master, press me for a while
OK to give up all operations?
The video has not been exported yet, is it canceled?
The video has not been exported yet, is it canceled?
Encoding error occurred after turning on hardware acceleration, please try again and try again
Divide the video into multiple sections \ n Delete unneeded sections
drag the four corners can be cut to the proportion of video
long press and drag to adjust order yo
Drag the border and adjust the starting position of the effect
Drag the border and adjust the start position of the subtitle
Drag the border to adjust the starting end position of subtitle
Drag the thumbnail to confirm the effect insertion position
Drag thumbnail to confirm subtitle insertion position
Unable to preview the current clip!
Temporarily unable to preview, please try again!
Can not preview the current clip!
The current video duration has exceeded the maximum export time limit (% d seconds). You can close the prompt to adjust, or continue to export
Please be patient while exporting video ...
Are you sure you want to apply to all images?
only one picture, can not be deleted
Single select media can not exceed% d
unable to record, please open the recording permission!
not allowed to use the camera!
The camera can not be opened, please open the camera permissions!
Temporarily unable to preview, please try again!
There are horizontal video, vertical screen is not good, the system will choose the best screen
Are you sure you want to quit editing?
Are you sure you want to forego fragment editing?
recording time is too short, please try again!
No memory card or memory card is not loaded!
The current use of mobile phone storage space is small, may affect the video recording and editing!
There is not enough space to stop recording!
downloading resources, please try again later ...
The video has not been reversely completed, is it canceled?
Insufficient memory space to record video!
The current memory card is not mounted
No network available, unable to display full font list
Drag the yellow area, select the area you want to adjust
The soundtrack does not exist or is not supported, please select again!
At least two images or videos are required for the transition!
Are you sure you want to apply random transitions? This will clear the content that has been set!
Swipe to select the clip you want to clip
Intercept feature only supports video files
Drag the yellow area, select the video clips you want to keep
Drag the black area, select the video clips you want to delete
try segmentation function, can cut out the unwanted images yo
not allowed to read pictures, video!
video is less than 0.5 seconds, can not be divided
video is less than 0.5 seconds, can not add transition
video is less than 1 second and can not be intercepted
